# accessories

**Instance Property**

Accessories to display alongside the pointer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var accessories: [UIPointerAccessory] { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property supports up to four pointer accessories. The system animates between neighboring or similar accessories.

## Specifying pointer accessories

- **UIPointerAccessory**: Constants that describe accessories to display alongside the primary pointer.
